data.title: Pastor Jack Hibbs
data.meta_site_name: Pastor Jack Hibbs - Preaching truth to the culture.
data.text:
The Christian In Love Makes For A Church At Work – B

Air Date: 08/15/2024 | Scripture: 1 Corinthians 14:1-40

Today, we will learn that that there is so much more to being a Christian than just attending church. Believers can experience so much joy when they find God’s purpose for their lives.

A Church Under Repair – B

Air Date: 08/13/2024 | Scripture: 1 Corinthians 14:26-40

Today, Pastor Jack teaches that when the church is operating with humble obedience, and God’s holy wisdom, together we can finish the work that God has called us to do.

A Church Under Repair – A

Air Date: 08/12/2024 | Scripture: 1 Corinthians 14:26-40

Today, Pastor Jack teaches us that an effective church will build up the people, while making sure everything is functioning properly so that all may learn and be encouraged.

God-Ordained Priorities – 2B

Air Date: 08/09/2024 | Scripture: 1 Corinthians 14:6-25

Today, Pastor Jack teaches that God ordained priorities are to govern our way of life. To come to the end of our own desires and motives is to have the Lord waiting there in absolute power and peace.

God-Ordained Priorities – 2A

Air Date: 08/08/2024 | Scripture: 1 Corinthians 14:6-25

Today, Pastor Jack teaches that if we are the church, then we’re to be clear about our call, our mission, and our usefulness, and grow in our understanding about our spiritual gifts.

God-Ordained Priorities – 1B

Air Date: 08/07/2024 | Scripture: 1 Corinthians 14:6-25

Today, Pastor Jack teaches that we need to ask the Lord to give us understanding. We can go to Him alone in prayer knowing that He will make clear all the things we need to know.

God-Ordained Priorities – 1A

Air Date: 08/06/2024 | Scripture: 1 Corinthians 14:6-25

Today, Pastor Jack teaches that the Lord provides all that we need to be used for His purpose. God wants us to be clear about our mission, and to share with such clarity, that it brings life to all that are willing to listen.

Body Building In The Church Of God – 3B

Air Date: 08/05/2024 | Scripture: 1 Corinthians 14:1-5

Today, we will learn that whenever we share the Word of God, it has the power to reach people of all walks of life. And, what are the results? A decision is always made, either to follow Christ, or to deny Him.

Body Building In The Church Of God – 3A

Air Date: 08/02/2024 | Scripture: 1 Corinthians 14:1-5

Today, we will learn that in order to reach the world for Jesus, it will take unity and power that is not of this world. This is why Jesus came and taught about the kingdom of God, by the power of the Holy Spirit.

Body Building In The Church Of God – 2B

Air Date: 08/01/2024 | Scripture: 1 Corinthians 14:1-5

In today’s message we will learn that true Christians will care deeply about building up the church, and will understand how much we need to prepare our hearts for what God wants us to do.

Body Building In The Church Of God – 2A

Air Date: 07/31/2024 | Scripture: 1 Corinthians 14:1-5

Today, we will learn that the church is not a company, or a business, or simply a movement. It is literally a living, breathing organism that Jesus is in love with, and is deeply concerned about its effectiveness.
